title: Cowboys-Bears, NBA, Tom Brady, & mobile QBs
itunes:title: Cowboys-Bears, NBA, Tom Brady, & mobile QBs
description:
Colin explains how the Cowboys and Bears have made the same mistakes, why the NBA ratings may be down, why Tom Brady is frustrated but has leverage, and why mobile QBs are not a fad. Guests include Mark Schlereth, Greg Cosell, Steve Beuerlein, and Andrew Siciliano.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
